au.edu.federation.caliko.visualisation

Class Axis

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.federation.caliko.visualisation.Axis

  • public class Axis
extends Object
    A class to represent a 3D axis which consists of three drawn lines, one each in the +x, +y and +z directions.

    Because any Axis objects are be drawn using a provided ModelViewProjection matrix, they are a convenient way to visualise a coordinate system.

    Version:
    0.4 - 15/10/2015
    Author:
    Al Lansley

    • Constructor Detail

      • Axis

        public Axis(float axisLength,
            float axisLineWidth)
        Construct an axis which will be draw with a given line length and line width.

        If the axis length is less than zero or the axis line width is less than 1.0f then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        axisLength - The length of the line representing the X/Y/Z axes.
        axisLineWidth - The width of the line representing the X/Y/Z axes.

    • Method Detail

      • setLineWidth

        public void setLineWidth(float axisLineWidth)
        Set the line width with which to draw this axis.

        While many OpenGL implementations allow for varying line widths, only a line width of 1.0f is guaranteed to work. The maximum line width you can use depends on the OpenGL implementation.

        If an axis line width of less than 1.0f is specified then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        axisLineWidth - The width to draw the lines of the axis in pixels.

      • setAxisLength

        public void setAxisLength(float axisLength)
        Set the length of the lines used to draw this axis object.
        Parameters:
        axisLength - The desired axis line length.

      • draw

        public void draw(Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw an axis given a ModelViewProjection matrix.
        Parameters:
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix used to draw the axis
        See Also:
        Mat4f.createPerspectiveProjectionMatrix(float, float, float, float), Mat4f.createPerspectiveProjectionMatrix(float, float, float, float, float, float)

      • draw

        public void draw(FabrikStructure3D structure,
                 Mat4f viewMatrix,
                 Mat4f projectionMatrix)
        Method to draw an axis at each bone in a structure.

        The X axis is red, the Y axis is green and the Z axis (along which the axis is aligned with the bone) is blue.

        Parameters:
        structure - The FabrikStructure3D to draw.
        viewMatrix - The view matrix, typically extracted from the camera.
        projectionMatrix - The projection matrix, typically extracted from the OpenGLWindow.
